attributes.action: Drugs test every MP and the House of Lords - failures to be dismissed instantly.
attributes.background: Us, the normal British people, would instantly be dismissed from our places of employment if we were found to be under the influence of illegal drugs - whatever class of drug that may be - unless a specific prescibed drug from a gp.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and House of Commons aren't responsible for removing MPs from office. That is a decision for the electorate.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
